p: MABr ( 0.18 M), FAI (1.02 M) and PbI 2 (1 M) were dissolved in DMF. In order to study the effect of Zn(II), 2.5 % of ZnI 2 was also added (0.025 M). A third precursor solution was prepared including 2.5% of ZnI 2 and 2% of 3-CPACl (0.008 M) to study the effect of the amine hydrochloride additive in combination with Zn(II).
